name: Pushing Boundaries
description:
Pushing Boundaries is a platformer with a twist - resizing the game window resizes the boundaries of the level.  Cleverly manipulating the bounds of the game will allow the player to reach new areas and solve the puzzles within each level.  Are you up to the challenge?

Controls:

Move Left/Right - A/D

Jump - W or Space

Dash - Shift

Note: Resizing the game window will affect the layout of the level and allow the player to reach areas that were previously blocked off.

Music Produced by Juhani Junkala

Some Assets Borrowed from Shaun Spalding

This game was a submission for Game Off 2019, which had the theme "Leaps and Bounds."  The players jump and dash abilities represent leaps and bounds, and the player can modify the bounds of the game window to progress.
